column4: though i think i'll dist-upgrade to edgy once i back up my laptop
have you actually used compiz?
yeah.  i have.
so, then you should know you can turn most of the effects of and have a smooth desktop. It's the best thing that have happened to OS'ses in a long time.
my other issue is that i don't much like compiz as my WM.
why's that?
i like the way e17 works better :-P
I've had e17 and it's great, but really, really buggy.
i've not had any major issues in the past, say year.
are you using the whole e17 or just the window-manager?
the whole e17 IS the window manager.  i don't really use many of the efl based apps though
isn't enlightenment the WM and e17 the whole desktop?
nah, e17 is sorta the name for the WM and the supporting libraries
they quote about enlightenment window manager on their web-page, but who wants argue about semantics anyways.
my point being: the window manager might be okay, the whole desktop-thing just isn't ready or stable.
it's not supposed to be a whole-desktop thing right now.  it's not feature-complete yet :-P
well, neither is the window manager announced stable.. neither is compiz though.
I don't mind the window manager part of enlightenment at all. It's nice.
i've been using it as my WM on both my machines for a year now :-)
I don't see how it could compete with compiz if your hardware were supported, but it's okay ;)
meh, just personal preference.
what do you mean by certain.. if they indeed seem like random try to find a common deminator between them :P
they're from the same album :-P.  all the other FLAC files i have play fine but these.
meh.  reencoding it seems to fix it.  bah.
